HTTPHeadersCache-Control.summary: The Cache-Control HTTP header field holds directives (instructions) — in both requests and responses — that control caching in browsers and shared caches (e.g. Proxies, CDNs).

-RFC 5861 – HTTP Cache-Control Extensions for Stale Content
-RFC 8246 – HTTP Immutable Responses
